docs.snippet: NEW YORK. Mrs. Porter Morgan has left 10 Park Avenue for her Summer home in Stamford, Conn.

headline.main: Notes of Social Activities in New York and Elsewhere

docs.snippet: The Commerce Department's classified statement on origin and destination of gold imported and exported during May, in which month the exports stood second only to those of last October, shows that last month's shipments of $212,228,820 went to ten...
docs.lead_paragraph: The Commerce Department's classified statement on origin and destination of gold imported and exported during May, in which month the exports stood second only to those of last October, shows that last month's shipments of $212,228,820 went to ten separate countries, of which six took $7,000,000 or more.
docs.abstract: Rept for May on exports and imports

headline.main: 4 COUNTRIES TOOK GOLD HEAVILY DURING MAY; $63,222,535 Went to France; Large Amounts Taken by Hol- land, Belgium, Switzerland.

docs.snippet: Twenty-one athletes from Argentina and three from Uruguar reached the last lap of their 10,000-mile trip to Los Angeles for the Olympic games when they arrived in New York yesterday on the M.S. Northern Prince. Sun-bronzed track and field athletes,...
docs.lead_paragraph: Twenty-one athletes from Argentina and three from Uruguar reached the last lap of their 10,000-mile trip to Los Angeles for the Olympic games when they arrived in New York yesterday on the M.S. Northern Prince. Sun-bronzed track and field athletes, boxers, rifle-shooters and a sculler were in the party.

headline.main: 21 ARGENTINE STARS HERE FOR OLYMPICS; Ribas, World Record-Holder in 30,000-Meter Run, Among Men Reaching New York. 3 URUGUAYANS ALSO ARRIVE Latter Group Includes Douglas, Star Sculler -- Other South Ameri- cans Due Next Week.

docs.snippet: Communism cannot prosper in Uruguay and that country's institutions and people "constitute a healthy organism in which anarchist and dis- rupting germs cannot thrive," according to Dr. Juan Carlos Blanco, Uruguayan Minister of Foreign Affairs.
docs.lead_paragraph: Communism cannot prosper in Uruguay and that country's institutions and people "constitute a healthy organism in which anarchist and dis- rupting germs cannot thrive," according to Dr. Juan Carlos Blanco, Uruguayan Minister of Foreign Affairs.
docs.abstract: Min Blanco denies charge that Uruguay is Communist propaganda centre

headline.main: URUGUAY SAYS REDS FIND NO HAVEN THERE; Instructs Washington Legation to Deny Charge That It Is a Propaganda Centre.

docs.snippet: LIMA, Peru, July 7. -- An Aprista-Communistic rising in Trujillo, the third city of the republic, was reported in the official bulletin this afternoon.
docs.lead_paragraph: LIMA, Peru, July 7. -- An Aprista-Communistic rising in Trujillo, the third city of the republic, was reported in the official bulletin this afternoon.
docs.abstract: Aprista-Communistic rising in Trujillo quelled; martial law declared

headline.main: REDS REVOLT IN PERU; MANY DIE IN CLASH; Martial Law Is Declared for Thirty Days After Rising Is Quelled at Trujillo.

docs.snippet: CHARLOTTESVILLE, Va., July 7. -- Discussions of proposed amendments to the anti-trust laws, our relations with Latin America, and the country church and the rural ministry were continued at the University of Virginia today, while the two-day...
docs.lead_paragraph: CHARLOTTESVILLE, Va., July 7. -- Discussions of proposed amendments to the anti-trust laws, our relations with Latin America, and the country church and the rural ministry were continued at the University of Virginia today, while the two-day conference on regulation of women's work by law was concluded.
docs.abstract: A H Morrill on chain-store standpoint; United Fruit Co called monopoly by C D Kepner

headline.main: STORMS HAMPER VIRGINIA INSTITUTE; Two Meetings Are Postponed After Members Are Drenched Between Earlier Sessions. BANANA CONCERN ATTACKED Charles D. Kepner Says That United Fruit Company Does Not Always Respect National Authority.
